prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek blue body and long spider-like legs.
Imagine a bug-type creature that lives in wetlands with vibrant colors and unique features.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats, showcasing a blend of blue and yellow.
Show me a small, aquatic Pokemon with multiple legs and a cheerful expression.
Make a design for a Pokemon that resembles a spider and has water abilities.
Give me a colorful bug Pokemon that can adapt to both land and water environments.
Design a tiny Pokemon that combines both water and bug elements in its appearance.
